Title: Mercenary
Plot: Ragnar and Lagertha's fleets depart Kattegat once more for Wessex but this time they bring settlers. King Ecbert hosts the Vikings and proposes a deal. Despite the misgivings of some of the other leaders, Ragnar leads his forces into battle once more, but this time as allies of Wessex.
GuestStars: Amy Bailey, Moe Dunford, Maude Hirst, Gaia Weiss, Jefferson Hall, Jennie Jacques, John Kavanagh
